overview: The Girls of Kappa Tau Omega are popular, pretty, and love to party! However, the party will soon be dead! There's an uninvited guest in their new sorority house whose motto is Kappa Kappa Kill! Who will survive this hellacious night of blood, babes, and butchering?
tagline: Don't turn your back on the past... it might kill your future
title: Sorority Sister Slaughter
